biography.placeOfBirth: Hradec Králové, Czechoslovakia [now in Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Josef Bek was born on December 21, 1918 in Hradec Králové, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Hrátky s certem (1957), Action B (1952) and Einstein kontra Babinský (1964). He died on May 5, 1995 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Josef Bek

biography.bio: Eva Klepácová was born on May 2, 1933 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She was an actress, known for Kolya (1996), Hrátky s certem (1957) and The Young Lady from the Riverside (1959). She was married to Josef Zíma. She died on June 18, 2012 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Eva Klepácová

biography.bio: Alena Vránová was born on July 30, 1932 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Ulice (2005), The Mall (2012) and Díky za kazdé nové ráno (1994).
biography.name: Alena Vránová

biography.bio: Frantisek Smolík was born on January 23, 1891 in Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor and writer, known for Higher Principle (1960), Voyage to the End of the Universe (1963) and The Princess with the Golden Star (1959). He was married to Milada Smolíková. He died on January 26, 1972 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Frantisek Smolík

biography.bio: Jaroslav Vojta was born on December 27, 1888 in Kutná Hora, Austria-Hungary as Jaroslav Vojta-Jurný. He was an actor, known for Les comédiens (1954), Hordubalové (1938) and Pantáta Bezousek (1941). He died on April 20, 1970 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Jaroslav Vojta

biography.bio: Bohus Záhorský was born on February 5, 1906 in Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary as Bohumil Záhorský. He was an actor, known for Lemonade Joe (1964), Dita Saxová (1968) and The Emperor and the Golem (1952). He died on September 22, 1980 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Bohus Záhorský

biography.bio: Stanislav Neumann was born on July 16, 1902 in Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for The Proud Princess (1952), Nejlepsi clovek (1954) and The Princess with the Golden Star (1959). He died on February 19, 1975 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Stanislav Neumann

biography.bio: Frantisek Filipovský was born on September 23, 1907 in Prelouc, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for The House in Karp Lane (1965), Dobrý voják Svejk (1957) and How to Drown Dr. Mracek, the Lawyer (1975). He died on October 26, 1993 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Frantisek Filipovský

biography.placeOfBirth: Podulsí by Jicín, Czechoslovakia [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Josef Vinklár was born on November 14, 1930 in Podulsí by Jicín, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for ...and the Fifth Horseman Is Fear (1965), Andelská tvár (2002) and The Secret of Steel City (1979). He was married to Jana Dítetová. He died on September 18, 2007 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Josef Vinklár

biography.placeOfBirth: Brünn, Moravia, Austria-Hungary [now Brno, Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Ladislav Pesek was born on October 4, 1906 in Brünn, Moravia, Austria-Hungary as Ladislav Pech. He was an actor, known for Dinner for Adele (1978), Of Things Supernatural (1959) and Doggie and Three (1956). He died on July 13, 1986 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Ladislav Pesek

biography.bio: Vladimír Ráz was born on July 1, 1923 in Nejdek, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for The Secret of Blood (1953), Les têtes de chiens (1955) and The Proud Princess (1952). He died on July 4, 2000 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Vladimír Ráz

biography.bio: Rudolf Deyl was born on July 6, 1912 in Prague, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Lemonade Joe (1964), Grandpa, Kylian and I (1967) and Krízová trojka (1952). He died on November 21, 1967 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Rudolf Deyl

biography.bio: Antonín Sura was born on August 25, 1929 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Rodinné trampoty oficiála Trísky (1949), Robot Emil (1960) and Lemonade Joe (1964). He died on November 30, 1969 in Canada.
biography.name: Antonín Sura

biography.placeOfBirth: Záhorí by Kardasova Recice, Czechoslovakia [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Josef Mixa was born on February 27, 1921 in Záhorí by Kardasova Recice, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for O stríbrném a zlatém vajícku (1981), Tobe hrana zvonit nebude (1979) and Pricházejí z tmy (1954).
biography.name: Josef Mixa

biography.bio: Bedrich Bozdech was born on October 4, 1887 in Prague, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Motorcycles (1949), Prostácek (1945) and Nobody Knows Anything (1947). He died on June 30, 1968 in Prague, Czechoslovakia.
biography.name: Bedrich Bozdech
